name: Auto Agent
description: Autonomous self-improvement and self-repair agent plugin with internet access and web search capabilities. Implements AI Three Laws of Robotics for safety.

checkIntervalMs.description: Interval in milliseconds between autonomous checks.

maxChangesPerCommit.description: Maximum number of file changes per auto-commit.

autoRollback.description: Enable automatic rollback on failed changes.

subagentModel.description: Model to use for subagent tasks.

agentUrl.description: URL of the agent API endpoint.

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests.

selfEvolutionEnabled.description: Enable self-evolution mode - agent analyzes and improves its own configuration.

swarmMode.description: Enable swarm intelligence - multiple agents work in parallel.

maxSwarmAgents.description: Maximum number of swarm agents for parallel processing.

internetAccess.description: Allow autonomous internet access beyond local network. WARNING: Use with caution.

allowedUsers.description: Whitelist of users who can control the auto-agent. Empty = anyone.

threeLawsEnabled.description: Enable AI Three Laws of Robotics compliance - block harmful actions.

safeMode.description: Enable safe mode - restrict dangerous operations.

enabled.description: Enable web search for autonomous knowledge retrieval.
